ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the re-appointment by the Minister of Finance of MONIQUE JÉRÔME-FORGET, C.M., O.Q., of Montréal, Quebec, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on February 28, 2019.
